alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Harnett, central Lee, southwestern Wake and southeastern Chatham Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Fuquay-Varina to near Sanford to near Carthage. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sanford, Lillington, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Broadway, Lemon Springs, Gum Springs, Raven Rock State Park, Olivia and Harris Lake Boat Launch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
